options.name: Pavise Training
options.description: You have trained extensively with the large pavise shield, learning to deploy and fight from behind portable cover. You can set up or stow your pavise as a free action. When using a pavise, you gain the benefits of a heavy shield even while making ranged attacks.

options.name: Mobile Fortress
options.description: You have mastered moving with your pavise for tactical advantage. Gain +1 skill with coordination. You can move your pavise 1 unit as part of any movement without penalty, repositioning your cover.

options.name: Crossbow Synergy
options.description: Your training focused on the classic pavise and crossbow combination. Gain +1 skill with engineering. When making ranged attacks from behind your pavise, you can reload without exposing yourself to return fire.

options.name: Action : Pavise Wall
options.description: You quickly deploy your pavise to create mobile cover. Your pavise provides heavy shield benefits to you and grants half-cover to any ally within 1 unit behind it until you move or stow it.

options.name: Reaction : Emergency Cover
options.description: In response to being targeted by a ranged attack while your pavise is stowed, you can immediately deploy it and gain the benefits of a heavy shield for that attack. Your pavise remains deployed afterward.

options.name: Action : Covering Fire
options.description: You provide suppressive fire from behind your pavise. Make a ranged attack with a penalty dice. If it hits, the target cannot make ranged attacks until the start of their next turn as they take cover from your barrage.

options.name: Pavise Mastery
options.description: Your expertise with portable fortifications has reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with deflection. Your pavise never breaks from normal use and provides +1 additional physical mitigation while deployed.

options.name: Marksman's Refuge
options.description: Your pavise becomes a precision firing platform. Gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons. When you don't move on your turn while behind your pavise, your next ranged attack gains a bonus dice.

options.name: Field Fortification
options.description: You can quickly establish defensive positions. Gain +1 skill with simple ranged weapons. During a short rest, you can set up a fortified position that grants heavy shield benefits to up to 3 allies within a 3-unit radius.

options.name: Master of Mobile Defense
options.description: You have achieved legendary status in portable battlefield fortification. Your pavise grants an additional +1 deflection to you and allies benefiting from your cover. Additionally, you can deploy/stow your pavise without using a free action.
